calculations.name: YTD Value - YoY
calculations.tableau_expression: ([YTD Value] - [YTD Value - Last Year])/[YTD Value - Last Year]

calculation_context.Expression: ([YTD Value] - [YTD Value - Last Year])/[YTD Value - Last Year]

calculated_fields.Measure Selector:
case [Parameters].[Measure Selector Param]
    when 'Profit' then [Profit]
    when 'Sales' then [Sales]
END
